title: Game Crash Right After Champion Select
body:
Today I have tried to play multiple games but have been having the same issue over and over. Everything up until after the champion select screen works fine until I get a black screen with the message ["Unable to connect to the server. Please check your internet connection and attempt to reconnect to your game."](http://imgur.com/zHlHy3g) and it gives me the options of Retry and Cancel. Of course, I retry and it gives the same message. (My internet was and still is working fine.) When I click cancel, on the other hand, it takes me to the ["The Game has crashed. Please try to reconnect to the game."](http://imgur.com/MmNH4Ho) I click "Reconnect" yet it gives the same message. I would appreciate the assistance. Thanks! 

P.S. Yes I have tried to Repair my League client and it, unfortunately, gives the same results.

replies.body:
It sounds like your client isn't able to establish a stable connection to the game server, which is causing you to crash out of even loading into the match. This can be potentially caused by a lot of factors, but local network settings or ISP routing are the biggest ones. A good place to start would be our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) since it goes over the most common resolves for this issue.

Let me know if you still see issues after working through that guide.

I tried every fix of "connection guide" but nothing helped me. My connection is perfect and when i join the game i have not any problems.

If the steps weren't able to resolve anything, there could certainly still be issues in your ISP routing. To investigate further, I recommend grabbing a set of logs using our [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs), then attaching them to your [ticket submission](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

Let me know if you have any questions.

Hey Targons Blade,

I have tried everything possible from doing the Hextech Repair Tool and submitting a ticket, I have rebooted my network and even reset the network settings, I have repaired and fully reinstalled the game, however, none of this seems to work. I have even tried to play a custom and receive the same error message as before. 

I would appreciate the assistance and looking further into this issue. Thanks!

All you have to do when it says retry or cancel, exit out the whole client than open league desktop again, log back in and hit reconnect and it should work.

- This happened to me and this method worked multiple times.

Same problem, but i can rejoin the game after 2-3 minutes. I tried a lot of fixes but nothing helped me. I have this problem for 1 month. Please Riot fix it.
